name: PKs Rebalancing
description: Rebalances spawn list, adds new monsters and items, adds new buildings, adds radiation effects to attacks of monsters with more items spawns to counter said radiation, and strives to create a harsher enviornment to survive in. INCLUDES PATCH OPTIONS which are HIGHLY RECOMMENDED in spawns folder to disable changes to forest along with river monster groups along with changes to zombies monster groups while still retaining various new zombies evolution types.
